body.raw:
{
    "name": "Jane Doe",
    "social": "TELEGRAM",
    "socialNick": "jane_d",
    "transferSite": "https://example.com/transfer",
    "transferWagger": 1500,
    "transferReasons": "Looking for better VIP rewards and faster withdrawals",
    "transferAvgDeposit": 300.75,
    "transferPlaysWeek": 25,
    "favoritesGames": "Poker, Blackjack, Roulette",
    "status": "ACTIVE"
}

{
    "name": "Jane Doe",
    "social": "TELEGRAM",
    "social_nick": "jane_d",
    "transferSite": "https://example.com/transfer",
    "transferWagger": 1500,
    "transferReasons": "Looking for better VIP rewards and faster withdrawals",
    "transferAvgDeposit": 300.75,
    "transferPlaysWeek": 25,
    "favoritesGames": "Poker, Blackjack, Roulette",
    "status": "ACTIVE"
}
